title: Attention Is Off By One
dot:
digraph AttentionBug{graph[rankdir=TB, fontsize=10, fontname="Arial", layout="dot"];node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=8];subgraph cluster_background{label="Background";style=dashed;"Attention Formula"[label="Attention Formula
softmax(QK^T / sqrt(d))V"];"Softmax Explained"[label="Softmax Explained
Maps real values to probabilities"];"Softmax in Attention"[label="Softmax in Attention
Forces decisions in attention heads"];"Outlier Issue"[label="Outlier Issue
Outlier activations in LLMs"];"Compression Challenge"[label="Compression Challenge
Difficult to compress due to outliers"];"Reference Papers"[label="Reference Papers
Qualcomm Research & Others"];}subgraph cluster_problem{label="Problem Identification";style=dashed;"Softmax Limitation"[label="Softmax Limitation
Cannot abstain in attention"];"Outliers in Tokens"[label="Outliers in Tokens
Whitespace & punctuation"];"Mathematical Issue"[label="Mathematical Issue
Not numerical, inherent in softmax"];}subgraph cluster_solution{label="Proposed Solution";style=dashed;"Softmax1"[label="Softmax1
(exp(x_i) / (1 + sum(exp(x_j)))"];"Quiet Attention"[label="Quiet Attention
Allows heads to abstain"];"Benefits"[label="Benefits
Reduces outliers
Improves compression"];}subgraph cluster_future{label="Future Work";style=dashed;"Experimentation"[label="Experimentation
Run tests on LLaMA or similar"];"Retraining"[label="Retraining
Models need retraining with Softmax1"];"Scientific Collaboration"[label="Scientific Collaboration
Open for testing and papers"];}"Attention Formula"->"Softmax in Attention";"Softmax Explained"->"Softmax in Attention";"Softmax in Attention"->"Outlier Issue";"Outlier Issue"->"Compression Challenge";"Outlier Issue"->"Reference Papers";"Softmax in Attention"->"Softmax Limitation";"Softmax Limitation"->"Outliers in Tokens";"Outliers in Tokens"->"Mathematical Issue";"Mathematical Issue"->"Softmax1";"Softmax1"->"Quiet Attention";"Quiet Attention"->"Benefits";"Softmax1"->"Experimentation";"Softmax1"->"Retraining";"Quiet Attention"->"Scientific Collaboration";"Experimentation"->"Scientific Collaboration";}
